item.title: 价格困扰选民，特朗普将削减牛肉和番茄关税
item.description: 据一位白宫官员透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统将于周五签署一项命令，降低牛肉、西红柿、咖啡和香蕉的关税，此举旨在降低食品杂货的成本，因为政府面临着选民要求降低日常用品价格的压力。【原文：President Donald Trump is slated to sign an order on Friday reducing tariffs on beef, tomatoes, coffee and bananas, according to a White House official, a move aimed at lowering costs on groceries as the administration faces pressure from voters to cut prices on everyday goods.】

item.title: NBA 审查森林狼队老板与卡尔希体育贸易公司的关系
item.description: 一家由 NBA 明尼苏达森林狼队和 WNBA 山猫队老板共同创办的公司已经开始在预测市场 Kalshi 上对体育比赛的结果进行交易，NBA 正在对这一安排进行审查。【原文：A company co-founded by the owners of the NBA’s Minnesota Timberwolves and the WNBA’s Lynx has started trading on the outcome of sports games on the prediction market Kalshi, an arrangement that is now being reviewed by the NBA.】

item.title: 荷兰公司驳斥中方指控，Nexperia 争端四起
item.description: Nexperia 拒绝接受其中国业务部门关于该公司通过阻止晶圆供应干扰生产的说法，因为即使在中国政府采取措施恢复重要汽车零部件的供应之后，这家荷兰公司内部的争斗仍在继续。【原文：Nexperia rejected a claim by its Chinese unit that it was interfering with production by blocking wafer supplies, as a feud within the Dutch company rages even after Beijing took steps to restore supplies of the vital automotive components.】

item.title: 贝莱德基金在 Binance 上发售标志着加密货币管道的转变
item.description: 贝莱德公司的代币化基金将被接受作为 Binance Holdings Ltd. 的抵押品，这一举措扩大了资产管理公司的区块链相关产品在最大加密货币交易平台上的使用范围，标志着华尔街与数字资产世界的联系不断加深。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s tokenized fund will be accepted as collateral on Binance Holdings Ltd., in a step that broadens access of the asset manager’s blockchain-linked products on the largest crypto trading platform and marks Wall Street’s deepening ties with the digital-asset world.】

item.title: 甲骨文信用衍生品大涨，交易员争相对冲人工智能赌注
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）的债务违约保护成本正以自2021年以来最大的幅度飙升，因为不安的投资者和贷款人急于对冲这家软件巨头在人工智能领域投入的数十亿美元。【原文：The cost of protecting Oracle Corp.’s debt against default is surging by the most since 2021, as jittery investors and lenders rush to hedge against the billions of dollars the software giant is pouring into artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 热门游戏《派遣》背后长达七年的动荡传奇
item.description: 由《霹雳游侠》的亚伦-保罗主演的超级英雄叙事游戏在 10 月 22 日发布后的 10 天内售出了 100 万份拷贝【原文：The narrative, superhero game starring Aaron Paul of ‘Breaking Bad’ sold 1 million copies in the 10 days following its Oct. 22 release】

item.title: 米莱为特朗普贸易协议打分，这将考验他的封闭经济
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱终于与唐纳德-特朗普达成了贸易协议，但这位自由主义领导人的政治胜利也是对其开放保护主义经济的挑战。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei finally has his trade deal with Donald Trump, but the libertarian leader’s political victory also represents a challenge to open up his protectionist economy.】

item.title: 创纪录的拖欠车款加剧了对次级汽车贷款机构的担忧
item.description: 继 Tricolor Holdings 公司和 PrimaLend Capital Partners 公司最近高调倒闭之后，创纪录的美国人拖欠车贷的人数激起了人们的担忧，次级汽车贷款公司将面临更多的痛苦。【原文：The record number of Americans falling behind on car payments is stoking concerns that more pain is in store for subprime auto lenders, following the recent high-profile collapses of Tricolor Holdings and PrimaLend Capital Partners.】

item.title: 法国达飞轮船公司为 2026 年航运业不景气做准备
item.description: 全球第三大集装箱航运公司达飞轮船公司（CMA CGM SA）预计，在运费下降、运力增加和贸易量减少的情况下，明年将出现行业衰退。【原文：CMA CGM SA, the world’s third-largest container line, is expecting an industry downturn to take hold next year amid lower freight rates, higher capacity and a drop in trade volumes.】

item.title: 埃克石油公司在 30 亿美元税务纠纷中避免资产冻结
item.description: 据哥伦比亚国有石油生产商的一位高级官员称，哥伦比亚税务局已排除在目前 30 亿美元的增值税纠纷中冻结属于 Ecopetrol SA 的资产的可能性。【原文：Colombia’s tax agency has ruled out freezing assets belonging to Ecopetrol SA during the ongoing $3 billion VAT dispute, according to a senior official at the state oil producer.】

item.title: 欧洲肥胖股加入医疗保健股涨势，人工智能贸易萎靡不振
item.description: 欧洲减肥药开发商本周卷土重来，原因是投资者从人工智能动力股转向医疗保健股。【原文：European weight-loss drug developers have staged something of a comeback this week, as investors rotate into healthcare from AI-exposed momentum stocks.】

item.title: 墨西哥养老金巨头关注私募股权和另类市场
item.description: 墨西哥的养老基金坐拥创纪录的现金储备，在扩大其投资能力的新规定出台后，正寻求增加对私募股权、信贷和其他另类投资的配置。【原文：Mexico’s pension funds, sitting on record cash piles, are looking to ramp up allocations to private equity, credit and other alternatives amid new rules that expand their investment power.】

item.title: Nexperia 供货紧张，汽车制造商要求 "无中国 "供货
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商正在研究如何避免使用来自中国的零部件，因为芯片制造商Nexperia和中国政府对稀土的出口管制所引发的地缘政治冲突不断加深，令他们感到恐慌。【原文：European carmakers are looking into ways to scratch components made with parts from China, spooked by deepening geopolitical spats playing out through chipmaker Nexperia and Beijing’s export controls on rare earths.】

item.title: 交易员等待延迟的经济数据，美国国债保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易员们在等待一系列推迟发布的经济数据，而这些数据有可能重燃对美联储降息的预期，因此国债市场停滞不前。【原文：Treasuries stalled as traders awaited a raft of delayed economic data with the potential to revive expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 加拿大预算监督机构怀疑卡尼能否兑现赤字承诺
item.description: 加拿大预算监督机构对加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）的政府能否履行其主要财政承诺之一持怀疑态度。【原文：Canada’s budget watchdog is skeptical Prime Minister Mark Carney’s government will fulfill one of its key fiscal pledges.】

item.title: 新泽西州保险公司同意支付 1 亿美元和解金
item.description: 新泽西州 Horizon 蓝十字蓝盾保险公司同意支付 1 亿美元，以解决举报人新近提起的诉讼中的指控。【原文：Horizon Blue Cross Blue Shield of New Jersey agreed to pay $100 million to resolve allegations in a newly unsealed lawsuit initiated by whistleblowers that accused the insurer of ripping off New Jersey taxpayers.】

item.title: Shein 在法国城市的开店时间将推迟
item.description: 巴黎历史悠久的 BHV Marais 百货公司的所有者表示，他将推迟在地区城市开设 Shein 实体分店，理由是需求太大，而分店空间不足。【原文：The owner of the historic BHV Marais department store in Paris said he would delay the opening of physical Shein outposts in regional cities, citing too much demand and insufficient space at the sites.】

item.title: 哈佛获得特朗普要求的 3,600 万美元美国银行担保
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）为哈佛大学提供了信用证，这是特朗普政府要求哈佛大学参与联邦学生援助计划的一个步骤，因为有官员称这所美国最富有的学校正处于财务不稳定的状态。【原文：Bank of America Corp. provided a letter of credit for Harvard University, a step required by the Trump administration for it to participate in the federal student aid program after officials alleged the US’s richest school is in a position of financial instability.】

item.title: 俄罗斯北极液化天然气 2 公司在冬季挑战来临前削减天然气产量
item.description: 俄罗斯受制裁的北极液化天然气二厂的天然气产量在 10 月份达到创纪录水平后已开始减少，因为冬季冰雪的堆积使出口变得更加困难。【原文：Russia’s sanctioned Arctic LNG 2 plant has started curbing gas production after reaching records in October, as the buildup of winter ice makes exports more challenging.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席阿特金斯表示将审查代理权咨询流程
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会负责人表示，监管机构将考虑对代理顾问进行改革，因为这个为股东提供指导的行业将继续面临更严格的审查。【原文：The head of the US Securities and Exchange Commission said the regulator will consider reforms for proxy advisors as the industry, which provides guidance to shareholders, continues to face greater scrutiny.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为人工智能热潮将推动 2026 年创纪录的 18 亿美元债券销售额
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A fresh wave of spending to finance investments in artificial intelligence will help drive 2026 issuance in the US investment-grade market to a record $1.81 trillion next year, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 美元抛售潮接近尾声，哥伦比亚比索跌跌不休
item.description: 哥伦比亚比索的涨势正在逆转，因为人们猜测，政府本周早些时候推动比索升至三年高点的美元抛售潮即将结束。【原文：A rally in the Colombian peso is going into reverse on speculation that the government’s rush of dollar sales, which pushed the currency to a three-year high earlier this week, is coming to an end.】

item.title: 巴西糖厂转产乙醇，原糖创两周新高
item.description: 行业组织 Unica 周五公布的数据显示，由于巴西糖厂在 10 月下半月继续优先淘汰甘蔗制糖，原糖涨幅高达 3.1%，创两周新高。【原文：Raw sugar rose as much as 3.1% to a two-week high as Brazilian mills continued to shift priority away from using cane for sugar in the second half of October, Friday data from industry group Unica showed.】

item.title: 卢克石油公司与全球资产竞购者谈判以避免供应问题
item.description: 俄罗斯能源巨头卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）表示，在美国对该公司的制裁开始前几天，该公司正在就其国际能源资产与竞标者进行谈判。【原文：Russian energy giant Lukoil PJSC said it’s talking to bidders about its international energy assets, with days to go before US sanctions against the company are due to begin.】

item.title: 第一品牌资产负债表外贷款人寻求破产转移
item.description: First Brands 集团的一批债权人要求为发行近 25 亿美元表外债务的公司部门提供新的独立顾问，声称利益冲突有可能扰乱汽车零部件制造商的庞大破产案。【原文：A group of First Brands Group creditors is demanding new, independent advisers for company units that issued nearly $2.5 billion in off-balance-sheet debt, claiming conflicts of interest threaten to disrupt the sprawling insolvency case of auto-parts maker.】

item.title: 美联储施密德称更多减息可能引发通胀压力
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰夫-施密德（Jeff Schmid）表示，额外的降息措施可能会使更高的通胀率根深蒂固，而不是支撑劳动力市场。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City President Jeff Schmid said additional interest-rate cuts could do more to ingrain higher inflation than shore up the labor market.】

item.title: 巴西法院在债权人上诉后暂停 Oi 清算
item.description: 在一家陷入困境的电信公司的主要债权人提出上诉后，里约热内卢一家法院暂停执行将 Oi SA 推入清算程序的裁决。【原文：A Rio de Janeiro court suspended the decision that pushed Oi SA into liquidation after an appeal from one of the troubled telecommunications firm’s main creditors.】

item.title: 芝加哥交易大厅迎来人工智能引领未来的第二幕
item.description: 保罗-约翰逊（Paul R.T. Johnson）仍记得，在芝加哥期货交易所著名的交易大厅里，成千上万的交易员身着五颜六色的外套，大声叫卖着从玉米到利率衍生品等各种商品的订单。【原文：Paul R.T. Johnson still remembers the days when thousands of traders piled onto the Chicago Board of Trade’s famous trading floor wearing colorful jackets and shouting orders for everything from corn to interest-rate derivatives.】

item.title: 莫桑比克中央银行在降息的同时，也标志着债务风险的上升
item.description: 莫桑比克央行延长了降息周期，将基准利率降至历史最低点，同时警告政府推迟偿债带来的风险。【原文：Mozambique’s central bank extended its rate-cutting cycle, lowering its benchmark to a record low while warning of risks from the government’s delayed debt payments.】

item.title: 交易员担心美联储按兵不动，美国股市再度下挫
item.description: 周五上午，由科技股引发的美国股市大跌进一步加深，主要股指跌破支撑位，市场对美联储可能不会在下次会议上降息的担忧日益加剧。【原文：The tech-led selloff in US equities deepened Friday morning with key benchmarks dipping below support levels and mounting concerns the Federal Reserve may not cut rates at its next meeting.】
